item.title: Creating Custom Flag Value Sources
item.description: This guide walks you through the basics in creating a custom FlagValueSource using the bundled sources as examples.

item.title: Defining Flags
item.description: Defining Flags is the cornerstone of Vexil. Learn how to structure your FlagContainer, use FlagGroups and Flags of various types.

item.title: Flag Keys
item.description: This guide looks in depth at how Vexil calculates the key for each of its flags, and how you can control that process.

item.title: Snapshots
item.description: This guide takes you through Snapshots, which are one of the most versatile features of Vexil.

item.title: Vexillographer
item.description: How why and where to use Vexillographer, Vexil’s SwiftUI-based flag editing UI

item.title: Working with Flag Value Sources
item.description: The Vexil FlagPole supports multiple backend flag sources. This guide walks through the built-in sources, how a FlagPole determines the source hierarchy and how to manipulate it.
